articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: EU officials blast Hungary’s Orban over Ukraine stance, democratic decline - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Lawmakers belt out antifascist anthem, prompting European Parliament president to declare: ‘This is not Eurovision’.
articles.content: Top European Union officials have slammed Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban over democratic backsliding at home and his Russia-friendly stance that has blocked military and financial aid to Ukrai… [+2800 chars]
